t: New Line Home Entertainment - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - New Line Home Entertainment (formerly known as New Line Home Video) was the home entertainment distribution arm of the film production studio of the same name, founded in 1990. It was responsible for the distribution of all New Line Cinema theatrical films for release on VHS, DVD and Blu-ray.
